Html Helper here...

The purpose of HTML helpers here is to augment Code Igniter platform HTML helpers and to provide a cheap replacement when you want to disable Smarty (or any other template engine) support in BareboneMVC platform.

=== `html_options()` ===

`html_options()` is a function that creates `<select><option>` group as HTML format string. 

{{{
string html_options(dictionary params)
}}}
